com.pos.device.sys

Class SystemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.sys.SystemManager

  • public class SystemManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains somme functions that allows the common app to call system interface.

    • Method Detail

      • updateFirmware

        public static int updateFirmware(java.lang.String packageFilePath)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Verify signature of the special update package, if success, then reboots the device in order to install the given update package.
        Parameters:
        packageFilePath - the update package path to install. Must be on a partition mountable by recovery. (The set of partitions known to recovery may vary from device to device. Generally, /cache. so you should copy the firmware file to /cache.)
        Returns:
        returned 0 if success, else refer to the error code definition.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • installApp

        public static int installApp(java.lang.String apkPath)
        Call this method to install application silently.
        Parameters:
        apkPath - The path of apk file.
        Returns:
        returned 0 if success else refer the error code.

      • installApp

        public static int installApp(java.lang.String apkPath,
             int mode)
        Call this method to install application.
        Parameters:
        apkPath - The path of apk file.
        mode - The installtion mode MODE_NORMAL_INSTALL, MODE_SILENT_INSTALL, or MODE_AUTO_RUN_AFTER_SILENT_INSTALLED
        Returns:
        returned 0 if success else refer the error code.

      • uninstallApp

        public static int uninstallApp(java.lang.String packageName)
        Call this method to uninstall the application silently.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The package name to uninstalled application.
        Returns:
        returned 0 if success else refer the error code.

      • reboot

        public static void reboot()
        Call this method to reboot the device.

      • setHomeRecentAppKeyEnable

        public static void setHomeRecentAppKeyEnable(boolean homeKeyEnable,
                             boolean recentAppKeyEnable)
        To set Home and Recent app keys enable or disable.

        if set enable, the Home and Recent app keys are taken over by system. the application can not receive the key event.

        if set disable, the Home and Recent app keys are not effective when click them,while the application can receive the key event by keyCode.

        Parameters:
        homeKeyEnable - true: home key is enable, false:home key is disable.
        recentAppKeyEnable - true: recent app key is enable, false:recent app key is disable.

      • writeLauncherPrioAppInfo

        public static int writeLauncherPrioAppInfo(java.lang.String pkgName,
                           java.lang.String className)
        Set the package name and class name of the application launched at boot time.
        Parameters:
        pkgName - package name of which app to launch when boot
        className - class name of which app to launch when boot

      • recovery

        public static void recovery()
        Factory reset the device.

      • recoveryReserveApps

        public static void recoveryReserveApps(java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageList)
        Factory reset the device but reserve user's apps with package list.

      • verifyImage

        public static int verifyImage(java.lang.String filePath)
        Verify image file only for CUSTOMER FreeMyPay temporarily.
        Returns:
        Verify return code. 0 if success. Other if fail.

      • controlNavigationBar

        public static int controlNavigationBar(boolean visible)
        To show or hide navigation bar.
        Returns:
        0 if success. -1 if fail.

      • setDefaultLauncher

        public static int setDefaultLauncher(java.lang.String packageName,
                     java.lang.String className)
        To set default launcher.
        Parameters:
        packageName - package name of which app to be set as default launcher
        className - class name of which app to be set as default launcher
        Returns:
        -3 if the application to set as the default launcher is illegal.

        To set Manufacturer OTA Channel on or off.
        Parameters:
        onOff - true:on; false:off.
        Returns:
        0 if success, -1 if fail.

        set PIN lock screen password
        Parameters:
        password - only number, at least 4
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setScreenTimeOut

        public static boolean setScreenTimeOut(int sec)
        set screen time out
        Parameters:
        sec - seconds(10 <= sec <= 2147483) from now
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setLockTimeOut

        public static boolean setLockTimeOut(int sec)
        set lock screen time out after screen off
        Parameters:
        sec - seconds(>= 0) from screen off
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • stayAwakeCharging

        public static boolean stayAwakeCharging(boolean enabled)
        stay awake while charging or not
        Parameters:
        enabled - true: stay awake; false: allow to off screen
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • getNavKeyStatus

        public static int getNavKeyStatus(int type)
        Get home key or recent app key status
        Parameters:
        type - Only supports 2 values: 1 - home key, 2 - recent app key
        Returns:
        1: enabled, 0: disabled, others: error

      • setPowerKeyDisable

        public static boolean setPowerKeyDisable(boolean disable)
        Disable or enable short press the POWER key.
        Parameters:
        disable - true: disable short press the POWER key, false: enable short press the POWER key.
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setChargeDisplayMode

        public static boolean setChargeDisplayMode(boolean show)
        Show or hide battery percentage at status bar
        Parameters:
        show - true: to show battery percentage; false: to hide battery percentage
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setScreenOrientation

        public static boolean setScreenOrientation(int orientation)
        Set system screen orientation After setting, please restart the device.
        Parameters:
        orientation - Only support SYSTEM_SCREEN_ORIENTATION_DEFAULT, SYSTEM_SCREEN_ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE or SYSTEM_SCREEN_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setFullScreen

        public static boolean setFullScreen(boolean enabled)
        Set to keep full screen. Swiping from top or bottom, the status bar and navigation bar still can not be displayed.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true:set full screen; false:cancel full screen
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setNoSimDialogVisibility

        public static boolean setNoSimDialogVisibility(boolean visible)
        Set whether to show the No SIM dialog.
        Parameters:
        visible - true:to show the dialog; false:to hide the dialog
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setDefaultWebView

        public static int setDefaultWebView(java.lang.String packageName)
        To set default WebView.
        Parameters:
        packageName - package name of which WebView to be set as default WebView
        Returns:
        -1 if the WebView to set as the default is not installed.

      • setCameraDisable

        public static boolean setCameraDisable(boolean disable)
        Disable or enable Camera.
        Parameters:
        disable - true: disable camera, false: enable camera.
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • isCameraDisable

        public static boolean isCameraDisable()
        Whether the camera is unavailable.
        Returns:
        true is camera unavailable; false is camera available
